message.name: ERR_QUERY_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: You must specify a Query Name before saving the query.

message.name: ERR_QUERY_XFV_ONLY_DATE_RANGE_OR_PAST_PERIOD_ALLOWED
message.locale: You must specify a date range using either the calendar selectors or the past weeks/days selectors.

message.name: ERR_QUERY_FV_TO_DATE_ENTERED_FROM_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: If a to date is entered, a from date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_QUERY_XFV_ONLY_ONE_PAST_PERIOD_ALLOWED
message.locale: You must specify a date range using only one of Last Number of Days or Last Number Of Weeks.

message.name: ERR_QUERY_RV_RECORD_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The record you are trying to update cannot be found. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_QUERY_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Query Name '%1s' already exists, please choose a different name.

message.name: ERR_QUERY_FV_UNKNOWN_ACTION
message.locale: The action '%1s' requested by the page is unknown. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_QUERY_FAILED_TO_PARSE_SAVED_QUERY
message.locale: The application failed to read back your saved query.Please contact your administrator.
